name: Catco's Galaxy RUST
description:
A universe-bending adventure about friendship, and saving the world from a dictator who wants to destroy the universe!

Features
  • A cute cast of friendly characters!
  • Difficult platforming levels!
  • An OST with a homemade feeling!

(This is an episodic game, currently, the only Act available for this game is Act 1.)

(Developed by Ocfrom and PeachSoda.)
